name: Holi
description: Holi is a vibrant festival of colors celebrating love and unity through playful festivities and joyous gatherings.

name: id al-Fitr
description: Eid al-Fitr is a festive celebration marking the end of Ramadan, characterized by communal prayers, feasting, and acts of charity.

name: Ganesh Chaturthi
description: Ganesh Chaturthi is a vibrant Hindu festival celebrating the birth of Lord Ganesha with colorful processions and elaborate idol installations.

name: Diwali
description: Diwali is a joyous Hindu festival of lights symbolizing the victory of light over darkness, celebrated with the lighting of lamps, fireworks, and festive gatherings.

name: Dussehra
description: Dussehra celebrates the victory of good over evil, marked by the burning of Ravana's effigies.

name: Krishna Janmashtami
description: Janmashtami celebrates the birth of Lord Krishna with fasting and devotional festivities.

name: Raksha Bandhan
description: Raksha Bandhan celebrates the bond between siblings through the tying of a rakhi.

name: Durga Puja
description: Durga Puja celebrates the goddess Durga's victory over Mahishasura with rituals and artistic displays.

name: Lohri
description: Lohri is a Punjabi harvest festival celebrated with bonfires, singing, and dancing.
